ch.icclab.cyclops.dashboard.database

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.icclab.cyclops.dashboard.database.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all SQL interaction with the database, like table creation, data selection and insertion.
